source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud would like very much to continue the search for Thancred.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud möchte nach den friedlichen Gnath suchen, die von dem Jäger in Fiederhag Hyuran-Kleidung erworben haben sollen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_01<tab>At Alphinaud's impassioned urging, you set out for Loth ast Vath to continue the search. Speak with the Vath storyteller and see if he recognizes Thancred from the sketch.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_01<tab>Alphinaud vermutet, dass die friedlichen Gnath aus Loth ast Vath gekommen sein müssen. Geh nach Loth ast Vath im Dravanischen Vorland und sprich dort mit dem Erzähler.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_02<tab>Though wary at first, the storyteller soon confirms that the Vath have indeed had dealings with Thancred. The “fleshling clothed in skins,” as they call him, came to them from Sohm Al weak and disoriented, and was given succor in exchange for meat and hides. According to the storyteller, he stayed with them for some time, but left recently, after learning that the Gnath had summoned forth Ravana from the aether once more─news which comes as a shock to your allies, but does much to explain the beastmen's recent aggression towards Anyx Trine. Fearing what may happen if Thancred is forced to face the Gnath alone, you resolve to find him before they do. Clear a path to Loth ast Gnath that your allies might follow.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_02<tab>Der Erzähler berichtet von einem in Fell gekleideten Mann, der den Vath im Tausch gegen Kleidung bei der Jagd geholfen hat. Als er hörte, dass die verbundenen Gnath ihren Primae Ravana beschwören wollen, ging er nach Loth ast Gnath. Suche dort nach ihm.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_03<tab>You quickly dispatch the sentries stationed outside the stronghold's entrance. All that remains is to wait for the others to arrive.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_03<tab>Mit den Gnath, die sich dir in den Weg stellen, machst du kurzen Prozess. Warte am <var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9E4F020402 /var> auf deine Gefährten.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_04Moments after being rejoined by your comrades, you hear the unmistakable sounds of battle coming from deep within the Gnath stronghold. Fearing that Thancred may be in danger, you rush towards the source of the cacophony, only to be confronted with an unexpected sight: a party of adventurers locked in combat with the Lord of the Hive, and having seized the upper hand no less. As you look on in silence, their leader cuts down the Gnath god in a display of power far beyond that of any common adventurer. An equal, perhaps? ...Or a rival? Cautiously, you and your allies approach the strangers, and as you lock eyes with their leader, you find yourself overcome with a vision of his past.

You see him and his comrades stand against an Ascian, just as you once stood against Lahabrea, and watch as they forge a blade to strike him down. A blade not unlike your own blade of Light.

“So you are the Warrior of Light. The savior of Eorzea.” Your counterpart regards you coldly, his every word dripping with disdain. A rival, then. Seeking to defuse the tension, Alphinaud warily requests an introduction, only to be greeted with a sudden display of force which scatters your allies, leaving you to face the leader alone. Grimly, you draw your weapon and prepare to meet his attack in kind, when suddenly, from on high, Thancred descends to duel with the warrior. After finding themselves to be evenly matched, the stranger withdraws, but not before declaring that he and his comrades are the Warriors of Darkness─and that you shall meet again.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_04<tab>Vor euren Augen wird Ravana von Abenteurern niedergestreckt, die sich euch als Krieger der Dunkelheit vorstellen. Als sie sich auf euch stürzen, greift Thancred in den Kampf ein und drängt sie zurück. Daraufhin teleportieren sich die Krieger der Dunkelheit weg und ihr flieht aus Loth ast Gnath. Sprich in der Qualmenden Öde im Dravanischen Vorland mit Thancred.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_05<tab>After escaping the Gnath stronghold, Thancred explains how he survived in the wilderness before making contact with the Vath, who furnished him with his new garments, and told him of Ravana, whom he was certain you would be drawn to face. However, he did not account for the intervention of the self-proclaimed Warriors of Darkness, who clearly harbor ill will towards you and yours. Yet how could they best primals and Ascians both if not through the power of the Echo? And if they are indeed blessed as you and Krile are, what would drive them to stand in apparent opposition to your cause?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_SEQ_05<tab>Thancred musste in der Wildnis einen harten Kampf ums Überleben führen, ehe er zu den Vath gelangte, die ihm neue Kleidung und Ausrüstung besorgten. So sehr das Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen mit Thancred Anlass zur Freude bietet, so beunruhigend ist die Begegnung mit den Kriegern der Dunkelheit. Kann es sein, dass sie über die Kraft des Transzendierens oder eine ähnlich starke übernatürliche Kraft verfügen?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_TODO_01<tab>Proceed to Loth ast Gnath, defeating any foes who stand in your way.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_TODO_01<tab>In Loth ast Gnath nach Thancred suchen

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_TODO_02<tab>Wait for your comrades to arrive.

TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Given that Alphinaud seems to recall the details of my return so <var 1A 02 /var>vividly<var 1A 01 /var>, I would rather he did not draw <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> from memory, talented or not.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Alphinaud steckt voller Überraschungen. Ich muss ihn nachher mal aushorchen, wo er so gut zeichnen gelernt hat.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_KRILE_000_002<tab>Honestly, that boy... Some things never change.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_KRILE_000_002<tab>Alphinaud hat gelernt, eins und eins zusammenzuzählen. Ich bin beeindruckt!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>Well, what are we waiting for? For all we know, Thancred could be waiting for us in Loth ast Vath!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>Die friedlichen Gnath, die von dem Jäger in Fiederhag Kleidung erworben haben, können eigentlich nur aus Loth ast Vath gekommen sein.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_004<tab>We must go and see the Vath right away. Come along, everyone! Come along!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_004<tab>Lasst uns den Vath einen Besuch abstatten und ihren Anführer, den Erzähler, nach Thancred fragen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_005<tab><click> <click> Great hunters, we welcome you once more to Loth ast Vath. What do you seek this day?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_005<tab><klick> <klick> Ah, Jäger! Was führt euch diesmal zu uns?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>We seek a man. A man with whom we are told you may have had certain dealings.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>Wir suchen jemanden. Habt Ihr den Mann auf dieser Zeichnung gesehen?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_007<tab>...How curious. The hunters tire of godly sport and pursue mortal prey?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_007<tab><klick> Genügt es euch nicht, einen Gott zu jagen? Nun seid ihr auch noch hinter einem Hyuran her.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_008<tab>No, no, he is not prey, but a friend long missing.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_008<tab>Nein, nein, bitte versteht uns nicht falsch. Dieser Hyuran ist keine Beute, sondern unser Freund.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_009<tab><click> <click> Good, good. He is a friend to the Vath as well, one with whom we have traded many times.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_009<tab>Euer Freund? <klick> Dann bin ich beruhigt. Für uns ist er ein gern gesehener Tauschpartner.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Truly? And you are quite certain it was this man?

TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_011<tab>There is no doubt. <click> <click> The fleshling clothed in skins came to us from Sohm Al, lost and weak. He offered meat and hides in trade, and in exchange we tended his wounds.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_011<tab>Eines Tages kam ein in Fell gekleideter Mann aus der Wildnis zu uns. Er war erschöpft und ausgemergelt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_012<tab>He brought us much flesh, so skilled a hunter he was. Much flesh. When he asked for garments, we were glad to provide them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_012<tab>Er schlug uns einen Tausch vor. Er wollte uns bei der Jagd helfen, wenn wir im Gegenzug passende Kleidung für ihn besorgen. <klick> Das haben wir getan und er hat sein Wort gehalten. Er ist ein guter Jäger!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_014<tab><click> <click> Gone to Loth ast Gnath. Not long ago. When he heard the Onemind had summoned our god once more.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_014<tab><klick> <klick> Als wir ihm erzählten, dass die Verbundenen ihren Gott rufen wollen, ging er nach Loth ast Gnath, um sich mit eigenen Augen davon zu überzeugen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_016<tab>Vidofnir did say that the Gnath had grown as before. But what could Thancred hope to accomplish by himself?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_016<tab>Vidofnir sprach davon, dass sich die Gnath erholt hätten. Wenn sie nun sogar ihren Primae Ravana erneut beschwören, ist die Lage mehr als ernst! Wir müssen uns beeilen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_017<tab>Honored elder, we thank you for your help. Would that we could repay this kindness ere we depart, but we must hasten to our comrade's side.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_017<tab>Ehrenwerter Erzähler, wir danken Euch für diese wertvolle Information. Wir werden unverzüglich bei Loth ast Gnath nach unserem Freund suchen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_018<tab>Go, great hunters, lest the Gnath claim him as a sacrifice. <click> <click>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_018<tab>Ihr tut gut daran, Freund<var 16 /var>schaft in Ehren zu halten. Eile ist geboten! <klick> Bevor die Gnath euren Freund fangen und ihn Ravana als Opfer darbringen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_100_018<tab><click> <click> One hunter, however skilled, cannot stand against the colony. Go to your friend.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_100_018<tab><klick> <klick> Der in Fell gekleidete Mann wollte nach Loth ast Gnath. Eile ist geboten, wenn ihr ihn retten wollt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_YSHTOLA_000_019<tab>We should be safe here. Our pursuers are not like to stray so far from the colony.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_YSHTOLA_000_019<tab>Ich glaube, wir haben die Gnath abgeschüttelt und können erst einmal durchatmen. Thancred haben wir zum Glück gefunden, aber unser Zusammentreffen mit den Kriegern der Dunkelheit gibt mir zu denken.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_KRILE_000_020<tab>The vision caught me unawares, and I was unprepared for their attack, but...I could hear the colony chattering all around us... They were so loud...so unbearably loud...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_KRILE_000_020<tab>Tut mir leid, aber mir ist etwas übel geworden. Solche Visionen der Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit strengen mich immer sehr an, und außerdem spüre ich in dieser Gegend ein quälendes Durcheinander von Gedanken.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Do you need to sit down? I have water, if it will help.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Krile, wie geht es dir? Die Ereignisse haben sich ganz schön überschlagen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_022<tab><click> <click> The colony laments for Lord Ravana. Was this your doing?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB105_02160_VATHSTORYTELLER_000_022<tab>Ah, der in Fell gekleidete Mann wurde also nicht geopfert. Das freut uns sehr! <klick> <klick>
